home.welcome: Welcome to GT Lounge online menu service. Enjoy!

menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: A classic pizza topped with pepperoni, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese.

menu.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
menu.description: Grilled chicken served over rice with teriyaki sauce, vegetables, and sesame seeds.

menu.name: Burger and Fries
menu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and served with crispy fries.

menu.name: Salmon Sashimi
menu.description: Fresh slices of raw salmon served with wasabi, soy sauce, and pickled ginger.

menu.name: Vegetable Pad Thai
menu.description: Rice noodles stir-fried with tofu, vegetables, peanuts, and a sweet and sour sauce.

home.welcome: GT Lounge online menü hizmetine hoş geldiniz. İyi eğlenceler!

menu.name: Biberli pizza
menu.description: Biberli, domates soslu ve mozzarella peynirli klasik bir pizza.

menu.name: Tavuk Teriyaki Kase
menu.description: Teriyaki soslu pilav, sebze ve susam ile servis edilen ızgara tavuk.

menu.name: Hamburger Ve Patates Kızartması
menu.description: Peynir, marul, domates ve çıtır patates kızartması ile servis edilen sulu bir dana köfte.

menu.name: Somon Sashimi
menu.description: Taze çiğ somon dilimleri, wasabi, soya sosu ve zencefil turşusu ile servis edilir.

menu.name: Sebze Yastığı Tay
menu.description: Tofu, sebzeler, yer fıstığı ve tatlı ve ekşi sos ile tavada kızartılmış pirinç eriştesi.
